attributes.action: Ban "let by" signs from being put up outside houses/flats anywhere in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The signs are an eyesore and make neighbourhoods undesirable.Many signs are left up permanently, despite the law saying they should be removed after 14 days of a tenancy being granted.
Many of the signs remain in place all-year-round despite properties being tenanted and only serve as advertising for rental companies
attributes.background: Most letting agents are ignoring 14 day rule.
